<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Topple Foe](/Feats.aspx?ID=6360) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 205 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=254)

**Prerequisites**
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6351); Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Trigger**
An ally succeeds at a melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) against an enemy you are both adjacent to.

</column>

---

You take advantage of the opening created by your ally to tip your foe off their feet. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=2382) the target of the triggering attack.
name: Topple Foe
